name: Secret Power
description: You strike a target with unknown power. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing 1d12 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or higher, roll a d6 and cause the random effect.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if the user is pumped up.
